name: TV Show "ZOOM" Quiz | TV for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the order of the ZOOMer's names?
questions.correct: Caroline, Aline, Estuardo, Garrett, Mike, Kortney, Shing Ying
options: Garrett, Caroline, Kortney, Aline,Shing Ying, Estuardo, Mike
Estuardo, Garrett, Kortney, Shing Ying, Caroline, Aline, Mike
Aline, Kortney, Estuardo, Mike, Shing Ying, Caroline, Garrett
questions.explanation:
Caroline, Aline, Estuardo, Garrett, Mike, Kortney, Shing Ying.

	This is the cast of the 3rd season of "ZOOM".

questions.text: Whose favorite ZOOMsci is Ski Boat air Jet?
questions.explanation:
Zoe.

	Zoe likes any ZOOMactivity that involves action.

Mike.

	Mike is a contrast between smart and silly.

questions.text: Who is into writing and sports?
questions.explanation:
Jessie.

	Jessie's favorite ZOOMtreat is Butterfly Cake.

questions.text: Who has a dog named Millie?
questions.explanation:
Matt.

	Matt lives with his mom, dad, older sister, and dog.

Kaleigh.

	Kaleigh's other hobbies are basketball, singing, dancing, and soccer.

Kenny.

	Kenny also loves to sing, dance, draw, and watch the clouds go by.

questions.text: Who has sticky cake and sends Chinese Red Envelopes every Chinese New Year?
questions.explanation:
Shing Ying.

	Shing Ying's nickname is Shingy.

questions.text: Who is outgoing, energetic, and fun?
questions.explanation:
Kortney.

	The coolest thing Kortney's ever done on "ZOOM" is make the treat Ice Cream Snowman.
